email.title: Spring Term TRAs Well-being Feedback
email.text:
If you've just finished your Spring Term TRAs (i.e. you're a third or fourth year student), please fill out this short form:
**https://forms.gle/o3Eofynm1LT6WUnk8**
Your feedback will be helpful in highlighting any well-being concerns and how the department can address them.
